title: A Capability Maturity Model for Hardened Commons
description:
A hands-on workshop for community focused organizers and leaders interested in strengthening the capture and censorship resistance of their commons. 

This session will explore different capability maturity levels for how Ethereum can best be used for groups to coordinate outside of traditional institutional structures. 

Expect hands-on exercises mapping to each level, centered around world-building and stress-testing ideals against reality. No previous knowledge or skills is expected.
